4.15. umbra.components.factory.scriptEditor.nodes¶

nodes.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines the umbra.languages.factory.scriptEditor.scriptEditor.ScriptEditor Component Interface class nodes.
